item.title: Capricorn Daily Horoscope Today, January 18, 2025 predicts fortune for job seekers - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Capricorn Daily Horoscope Today, January 18, 2025 to know your astrological predictions. No major monetary issue will exist today.

Date: January 18, 2025 | Source: Hindustan Times

The Capricorn horoscope for today suggests a positive outlook in finance and health, with job seekers likely to find opportunities.

  • Today's risks may pay off; no major monetary issues.
  • Love life may face challenges, but positive proposals are expected.
  • Job seekers may receive interview calls and offers.
  • Fortune in finances; wealth may flow in from previous investments.
  • Health is stable, but maintain a good diet and avoid late-night driving.
“Utilize every opportunity to prove your potential at the job.”

The day looks promising for Capricorns in various aspects of life, with a focus on maintaining balance in love, finance, and health.

item.title: Chris Martin and Dakota Johnson visit Shri Babulnath Temple ahead of Coldplay's India concerts: Watch vid - TOI Etimes
item.description:
Chris Martin and Dakota Johnson Visit Shri Babulnath Temple Ahead of Coldplay's India Concerts

Date: [Date not specified] Source: Times of India

Chris Martin and Dakota Johnson charmed fans in Mumbai as they prepared for Coldplay’s upcoming concerts by visiting the iconic Shri Babulnath Temple to seek blessings.

  • Chris wore a traditional pastel blue kurta and Rudraksha mala, while Dakota donned a simple printed cotton suit.
  • The couple expressed respect for Indian customs, engaging in a spiritual experience at the temple.
  • Videos of Dakota whispering her wish to Nandi, Lord Shiva’s sacred bull, went viral.
  • Coldplay is set to perform three concerts in Navi Mumbai and a grand finale in Ahmedabad as part of their Music of the Spheres World Tour.
“Namaste,” greeted Chris, instantly connecting with fans upon their arrival in Mumbai.

The duo’s visit highlights Coldplay’s continued connection with India, beginning with their performance at the Global Citizen Festival in 2016.

item.title: Azaad Box Office Day 1 (Early Trends): Aaman Devgan & Rasha Thadani Destroy Every Single Debut Opening (Lead) Of 2024! - Koimoi
item.description:
Azaad Box Office Day 1 (Early Trends): Aaman Devgan & Rasha Thadani Break Records

Date: January 17, 2025 Source: Koimoi

After a long time, a lead debut pair arrives in the theaters with Aaman Devgan and Rasha Thadani. Azaad has opened at the box office with decent numbers, surpassing many talked about films of 2024!

Best Debut Since 2024

Aaman and Rasha have delivered the best opening by debut actors in lead roles, surpassing the opening numbers of Lakshya’s Kill and others.

Azaad Box Office Day 1 Estimates

On the opening day, Azaad earned in the range of 1.5 – 1.7 crore. This number has arrived despite tough competition from Kangana Ranaut’s Emergency and Allu Arjun’s Pushpa 2 Reloaded.

  • Azaad: 1.50 crore* (estimated)
  • Kill: 1.35 crore
  • Ishq Vishk Rebound: 1.20 crore
  • Laapataa Ladies: 1.02 crore

Will Loveyapa Surpass This Target?

Aaman Devgan and Rasha Thadani’s opening number will now be the target for the next set of debutants, Junaid Khan and Khushi Kapoor, whose film Loveyapa will arrive on February 7.

About Azaad

Helmed by Abhishek Kapoor, the film's synopsis mentions a young stable boy bonding with a spirited horse amidst rebellion in 1920s India.

Note: Box office numbers are based on estimates and not independently verified.

item.title: Kat Dennings reveals ‘very cruel’ things casting directors told her at age 12: ‘It was pretty crazy’ - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Kat Dennings Shares Harsh Audition Experiences at Age 12

Date: Jan 17, 2025

Source: Hindustan Times

In a recent interview, actress Kat Dennings revealed the cruel comments she received from casting directors at a young age, highlighting how the industry has transformed.

  • Dennings pointed out the lack of inclusivity and harshness of the acting environment in the '90s.
  • Despite receiving negative feedback about her appearance, her strong spirit kept her motivated.
  • She credited her parents for supporting her during those challenging times.
  • Dennings observed that today’s industry is much kinder, promoting body positivity and inclusivity.
“How can anyone say that about a little kid? This is insane,” Dennings reflected on the cruel comments.

Dennings' experiences shed light on the improvements in the entertainment industry over the decades and the importance of support and resilience.

item.title: Emergency Box Office Day 1 (Early Trends): Kangana Ranaut Opens 130% Better Than Last Theatrical Release By A Female Director! - Koimoi
item.description:
Emergency Box Office Day 1 (Early Trends): Kangana Ranaut Opens 130% Better Than Last Theatrical Release

Date: January 17, 2025 | Source: Koimoi

Kangana Ranaut’s new film, Emergency, has debuted successfully at the box office, showing a significant improvement over her previous release.

  • The film opened with earnings between 2.35 - 2.5 crore.
  • This opening is approximately 88% higher than her last film, Tejas, which earned 1.25 crore.
  • Emergency marks Kangana’s best box office opening since the pandemic.
  • It debuted 130% better than the last film directed by a female director, Laapataa Ladies.
“Based on true events that unfolded in 1975 under the leadership of Mrs Indira Gandhi.”

The film, directed and produced by Kangana herself, has potential to continue performing well over the weekend.

item.title: Ibrahim Ali Khan Or Taimur — Who Took Saif Ali Khan To Hospital After Attack? - News18
item.description:
Who Took Saif Ali Khan to the Hospital After His Attack?

Date: January 17, 2025 Source: News18

The recent stabbing of Bollywood actor Saif Ali Khan has raised questions regarding who accompanied him to the hospital. Initial reports indicated that his eldest son, Ibrahim Ali Khan, was the one who took him, but recent statements have clarified otherwise.

  • Saif Ali Khan was attacked at his Mumbai home and subsequently hospitalized.
  • Confusion arose about whether Ibrahim or his son Taimur took him to the hospital.
  • Doctors confirmed that Taimur, his 8-year-old son, was present when Saif arrived at the hospital.
  • Initial reports suggested Ibrahim rushed his father to the hospital but were contradicted by hospital staff's statements.
  • The incident has sparked extensive media coverage and public interest.
“Saif Ali Khan jab hospital aaye the, main woh doctor hu jo unko first hour mai mila hu. Unke poore usme blood tha, but he walked in like a lion with his small child...”

This incident has brought to light the challenges and risks faced by celebrities and their families, highlighting the importance of safety in their personal lives.

item.title: After getting brutally trolled, Urvashi Rautela apologies to Saif Ali Khan for her 'insensitive' remark: 'I'm - DNA India
item.description:
Urvashi Rautela Apologizes to Saif Ali Khan for Insensitive Remarks

Date: January 17, 2025 | Source: DNA India

Urvashi Rautela, the Bollywood actress, has publicly apologized for her recent comments regarding Saif Ali Khan's injury, acknowledging them as 'insensitive' and expressing her regret.

  • Rautela was criticized for boasting about her diamond watch while discussing Khan's stabbing incident.
  • She expressed her feelings of insecurity about wearing expensive jewelry following the violent event involving Khan.
  • After facing severe backlash online, Urvashi admitted her remarks were ignorant and insensitive.
  • She reached out to Saif Ali Khan via Instagram, offering her support and apologies.
  • Despite her public apology, she continues to face criticism from netizens.
“I feel ashamed that I allowed myself to be consumed by the excitement surrounding Daaku Maharaaj… Please accept my sincerest apologies for being so ignorant and insensitive.” - Urvashi Rautela

This incident demonstrates the challenges celebrities face regarding public perception and the importance of being sensitive to others' circumstances.

item.title: Deva trailer: Pooja Hegde is back to big-ticket films - 123telugu
item.description:
Deva trailer: Pooja Hegde is back to big-ticket films

Published on: Jan 17, 2025 9:00 pm IST

Although Pooja Hegde currently has no films in Telugu, she is busy with multiple projects in Hindi, including Shahid Kapoor’s Deva, directed by Roshan Andrews.

  • The trailer for Deva has been unveiled following the success of the teaser, featuring Shahid Kapoor as a captivating cop.
  • Pooja Hegde stars as the female lead, with sizzling chemistry between her and Shahid, marking her comeback to Hindi cinema after a long hiatus.
  • Deva is set to hit theaters on January 31, 2025, promising a gripping watch.
“The cop drama appears realistic, showcasing Shahid in a never-before-seen avatar.”

The trailer has generated excitement for the film, anticipating a successful release.

item.title: Urvashi Rautela apologises to Saif Ali Khan for her ignorant remark about the knife attack: ‘I feel ashamed’ - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Urvashi Rautela Apologizes to Saif Ali Khan for Insensitive Remarks

Date: Jan 17, 2025 | Source: Hindustan Times

Actor Urvashi Rautela faced backlash for her tone-deaf comments regarding the stabbing incident involving Saif Ali Khan but has since issued an apology.

  • Urvashi Rautela made insensitive remarks while commenting on the attack on Saif Ali Khan.
  • She displayed diamond jewellery during her comments, which many found inappropriate given the circumstances.
  • Rautela later apologized on social media for her ignorance regarding the gravity of the situation.
  • Saif Ali Khan was attacked at his home and is currently recovering in the hospital.
“I feel ashamed that I allowed myself to be consumed by the excitement surrounding Daaku Maharaaj and the gifts I was receiving.”

In her apology, Urvashi expressed her regret and promised to prioritize compassion moving forward.

item.title: Dhartiputra Nandini actor Aman Jaiswal passes away in a tragic road accident - The Times of India
item.description:
Dhartiputra Nandini Actor Aman Jaiswal Dies in Tragic Road Accident

Publication Date: Not specified
Source: India Today Digital

TV actor Aman Jaiswal, known for his lead role in the show Dhartiputra Nandini, tragically passed away in a road accident at the age of 23.

  • Aman was involved in an accident on Jogeshwari highway while on his way to an audition.
  • He was hit by a truck while riding his bike.
  • His injuries were severe, and he succumbed to them approximately thirty minutes later at Cama Hospital.
  • The news was confirmed by Dhiraj Mishra, the show's writer.
“Aman was on his way to an audition. His bike was hit by a truck.” - Dhiraj Mishra

This tragic incident has left fans and colleagues in shock, mourning the loss of a talented young actor.

item.title: TV actor Aman Jaiswal dies at 23 in road accident - Moneycontrol
item.description:
TV Actor Aman Jaiswal Dies at 23 in Road Accident

Date: January 17, 2025 / Source: Moneycontrol

TV actor Aman Jaiswal, known for his role in Dhartiputra Nandini, tragically passed away in a road accident on January 17.

  • Aman was hit by a truck while riding his bike on Jogeshwari Highway.
  • He was taken to Cama Hospital but succumbed to his injuries half an hour later.
  • The news was confirmed by writer Dhiraj Mishra.
“Aman was rushed to Cama Hospital but succumbed to his injuries half an hour later.” - Abhinesh Mishra

This tragic incident highlights the dangers of road traffic and its severe consequences.

item.title: 'Emergency' movie review: From 'iron lady' to meek mimicry: Kangana's Indira falls short - Deccan Herald
item.description:
Emergency movie review: From 'iron lady' to meek mimicry, Kangana's Indira falls short

Published on: 17 January 2025 IST

Emergency begins with an overlong disclaimer about "drawing inspiration" from real-life events, but ultimately disappoints with melodrama. Kangana Ranaut portrays Indira Gandhi but lacks the character's confidence and power.

  • The film melds historical events with musical elements awkwardly.
  • Notable historical figures are caricatured, with little context provided for significant events.
  • Kangana's portrayal attempts redemption for Indira but lacks nuance and subtlety.
  • The narrative suggests Indira's power obsession led to her downfall.
“For all the mayhem he causes, Vishak Nair's Sanjay Gandhi is the only one who comes across as real...”

Ultimately, Emergency resembles a jumbled caricature of a critical historical period.

item.title: Aman Jaiswal, Dhartiputra Nandini Actor Dies In Road Accident At 23 - Times Now
item.description:
Dhartiputra Nandini Actor Aman Jaiswal Dies In Road Accident

Publication Date: Not Specified Source: Times Now

Indian television actor Aman Jaiswal tragically died at the age of 23 in a road accident, after being hit by a truck while riding his bike. He was taken to a local hospital but succumbed to his injuries shortly after.

  • Aman was known for his role in the TV show Dhartiputra Nandini.
  • He was on the Jogeshwari Highway when the accident occurred.
  • Director Dhiraj Mishra paid tribute to Aman on social media.
  • Aman had a background in modeling before becoming an actor.
  • He had appeared in other notable shows including Punyashlok Ahilyabai and Udaariyaan.
“You will live in our memories... God can be so cruel sometimes your death made me realize today... Good bye @aman__jazz” - Dhiraj Mishra

Aman's unexpected death has shocked his fans and the entertainment community, highlighting the dangers on the roads.

item.title: Abhishek Bachchan reveals if he's in the ‘interval or climax’ of his career: ‘I've been at this for 25 years’ - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Abhishek Bachchan Reveals If He's in the ‘Interval or Climax’ of His Career

Published on: Jan 17, 2025 | Source: Hindustan Times

In a recent interview, actor Abhishek Bachchan spoke about his career and what he hopes for from the future after 25 years in the industry.

Main Points

  • Abhishek Bachchan reflects on whether he is in the 'interval or climax' of his career.
  • He feels a new phase is starting, marking a significant moment in 2025.
  • He emphasizes the role of his family in his life and career.
  • He expresses pride in his grandfather's legacy and hopes his daughter will honor it.
  • His film career includes notable works like 'Refugee' and 'Yuva,' with upcoming projects like 'Housefull 5.'

Notable Quotes

“Right now, I think interval would be right... I do feel that a new phase is about to start.”
“I am what I am today because of my family... I will work and do whatever I have to ensure the continuance of the love that we get because of my grandfather.”

Abhishek Bachchan’s career spans 25 years, and he remains hopeful and reflective about his journey as he approaches a new phase in his professional life.

item.title: Emergency Twitter Review: Kangana Ranaut leaves audiences shook; fans call film must-watch, say ‘Kangana is Indira’ - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Kangana Ranaut’s Emergency released in theatres today. Here’s what the audience thought of her portrayal of Indira Gandhi

Date: January 17, 2025

Source: Hindustan Times

On January 17, 2025, Kangana Ranaut’s film Emergency hit theaters, with audiences eager to see her representation of former Prime Minister Indira Gandhi. Fans took to social media to share their positive reactions to her impactful performance.

  • Fans praised Kangana Ranaut's transformative performance as Indira Gandhi.
  • Many highlighted the film's gripping narrative and high-quality direction and cinematography.
  • Audience reviews point to the film's significance, calling it a must-watch for every citizen.
One fan stated, “Must watch for every citizen. Film could have been even more powerful if the original version had been allowed to release.”

The film seems to have successfully captured the attention and admiration of viewers, with discussions on social media indicating a strong reception.

item.title: 'Kitna time lagega': Auto driver recounts rushing Saif Ali Khan to hospital after brutal attack - The Times of India
item.description:
Auto Driver Rushes Saif Ali Khan to Hospital After Attack

Publication Date: October 2023 | Source: Times of India

An auto driver shared his experience of swiftly transporting Bollywood actor Saif Ali Khan to the hospital following a brutal attack.

  • The auto driver described the urgency and fear during the ride.
  • Saif Ali Khan sustained injuries during the incident.
  • The community came together to support the incident victims.
"I saw him in distress and knew I had to get him help fast." - Auto Driver

The swift actions of the driver highlight the importance of community support in crisis situations.

item.title: Game Changer: One Week to Match Opening Day Reported Number - TrackTollywood
item.description:
Game Changer: Exaggerated Opening Day Collections Spark Controversy

Publication Date: [Date not provided] Source: [Source not provided]

The makers of Game Changer are facing backlash after it was revealed that their claimed opening day gross of ₹186 crore was inflated by over ₹100 crore. This discrepancy led to criticisms from trade analysts and audiences as the film's actual first-week gross reached only ₹187 crore.

The controversy centers around misleading financial claims which have damaged the film's reputation. Acknowledging the negative feedback, the production team chose not to release further box office numbers, allowing attention to return to the film rather than its inflated earnings.

  • Claimed opening day gross was ₹186 crore.
  • Actual first-week gross matched opening day at ₹187 crore.
  • Criticism from trade analysts regarding misleading box office reporting.
  • Producers' decision to stop releasing inflated numbers was appreciated.
  • The episode highlights the importance of transparency in box office reporting.
“Honesty in box office reporting is crucial to maintaining credibility in an industry that thrives on audience trust and goodwill.”

The nuances of box office collections have significant implications, and Game Changer's team is likely to take away lessons that might guide future film promotions.

item.title: 'Saif Ali Khan wasn't scared': Autorickshaw driver who transported actor to hospital - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Heroic Autorickshaw Driver Narrates Saif Ali Khan's Emergency Transport to Hospital

Publication Date: January 17, 2025

Source: Hindustan Times

Bhajan Singh Rana, the autorickshaw driver, recounted the urgent transport of actor Saif Ali Khan to Mumbai's Lilavati Hospital after Khan was injured in a stabbing incident.

  • The incident occurred outside Saif Ali Khan's residence, where he was found bleeding from the neck.
  • Rana took approximately 8-10 minutes to reach the hospital, where Khan requested a stretcher upon arrival.
  • A child was also present with Khan during the transport.
  • Rana did not charge Khan for the ride, highlighting a moment of kindness amidst the chaos.
  • Doctors noted that Khan entered the hospital "like a lion," showcasing his resilience.
“The actor sat by himself in the three-wheeler. He did not seem scared and appeared normal,” informed Rana.

This event emphasizes the bravery and quick action of Rana as well as Saif Ali Khan's courage in a life-threatening situation.

item.title: Abhishek Bachchan addresses comparison with Amitabh Bachchan, Aishwarya Rai: ‘My wife is my wife’ - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Abhishek Bachchan addresses comparison with Amitabh Bachchan, Aishwarya Rai: ‘My wife is my wife’

Date: January 17, 2025 Source: Hindustan Times

Abhishek Bachchan recently spoke about the constant comparisons to his father, Amitabh Bachchan, and wife Aishwarya Rai, expressing pride in his family's legacy and dedication.

  • Abhishek has been active in the entertainment industry for 25 years.
  • He feels immune to comparisons, viewing them as a sign of his worthiness.
  • Praises Amitabh Bachchan's work ethic and dedication at 82, aiming to be seen the same way by his daughter in the future.
  • Announced upcoming film projects, including "King" with Shah Rukh Khan and "Be Happy," which revolves around supporting a daughter's dance aspirations.
“My parents are my parents, my family is my family, my wife is my wife... I look at it like that.”

Abhishek Bachchan embraces the legacy of his family while carving out his own path in the film industry.
